This page is for Plotly.

```{r,include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
```

&nbsp;

### Line Plot: Order Quantity Change Over Time

```{r}
instacart_df %>%
  count(time, department) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~time, y = ~n, 
          type = "scatter", mode = "lines", color = ~department, colors = "viridis") %>% 
  layout(xaxis = list(title = 'Time'), yaxis = list(title = 'Number of Orders'))
```
